author: Azano Kouhei   Furuhashi Hideyuki   Kabei Yukako   Miyazawa Tatsuki   Raikaku Rei   Suzuki Suzu   Takahashi Yashichirou
description:
A collection of seven stories about various K characters.

- No.1 Yatogami Kuroh by Miyazawa Tatsuki
- No.2 Kusanagi Izumo by Azano Kouhei
- No.3 Yata Misaki by Takahashi Yashichirou
- No.4 Kushina Anna by Raikaku Rei
- No.5 Kamamoto Rikio by Suzuki Suzu
- No.6 Awashima Seri by Furuhashi Hideyuki
- No.7 Fushimi Saruhiko by Kabei Yukako>
